sourcesContent:
import { useContext, useState } from "react"; import BlockchainContext from "../store/BlockchainContext"; import { walletAddressSlicer } from '../utils/util' import InvestBox from "./InvestBox"; const MainSection = () => { const { handleConnectToWallet, account, handleDisconnectWallet, walletBalance, tokenStaked, tokenStakedByuser, ownerCount, approveYourself, approveStatus, stakedNft, withdraw, totalReward, rewardPerday, constantReward } = useContext(BlockchainContext); const [activeStake, setActiveStake] = useState() return (

{tokenStaked / 100}% Yetis Staked:

Owners that have staked:

{tokenStaked} /10000

{ownerCount}
{ approveStatus === false ? (

Step 1: Approve the contract to Enable Staking your NFTs.

Step 2: Approve the contract to Enable spending your $FROST.

Step 3: Once complete, stake your MutantYetis for a 100 $FROST fee.

) : ( ) }
{ // TODO split investbox between bandits and mutants }
{ approveStatus === false ? (

Step 1: Approve the contract to Enable Staking your NFTs.

Step 2: Approve the contract to Enable spending your $FROST.

Step 3: Once complete, stake your MutantYetis for a 100 $FROST fee.

) : ( ) }

{tokenStakedByuser} staked MutantYetis

Pending $FROST Reward {totalReward}

Chance of loosing token on unstaking : 5%

The money lost by LilYetis when claiming goes to mutants

Mutants also get LilYetis stolen when unclaiming

{tokenStakedByuser} staked LilYetis

Pending $FROST Reward: {totalReward}

Chance of loosing token on unstaking : 5%

Chance of loosing staked FROST : 20%

Daily Reward: {constantReward} $FROST / YETI

You are currently earning: {rewardPerday} $FROST / Day

) } export default MainSection
